about.title: Creating impactful projects. Let's take your business to the next level with a professional and modern website.
about.body:
I'm Christian Gil, software designer and developer for the web based in Guadalajara, Jalisco, México.

 I will help your business look amazing with it's own website and to develop custom web applications.
